trans-unit.source: Animates from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> value of the previous key frame to its own <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value" /> using linear interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 使用線性插補，從上一個主要畫面格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 值以動畫顯示到其自有的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用做為一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames>以動畫方式顯示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>沿著一組主要畫面格的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格定義的區段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames>其所屬。

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每個主要畫面格有 target<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的時間主要畫面格之<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value%2A>應該達到。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格以動畫顯示從上一個主要畫面格的目標值至它自己的目標值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 先前的主要畫面格結束，並在達到它自己的索引鍵時間時結束時啟動它。

trans-unit.source: Linear key frames like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame> create a smooth, linear interpolation between values.
trans-unit.target: 線性的主要畫面格喜歡<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame>建立值之間的順暢、 線性插補。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的結束值 (也稱為「目標值」)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的結束值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的結束值 (也稱為「目標值」)。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面的 Key Time。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: Key Time 決定何時到達目標值，這也是主要畫面的結束時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定結束值和 Key Time，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 要建立動畫的來源值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 介於 0.0 和 1.0 (含) 之間的值，指定這個主要畫面格經過的時間百分比。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, in a linear fashion, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的漸次累加，在前一個主要畫面格值與目前主要畫面格值之間，以線性方式插入。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 在指定基底值和漸次累加時，這個主要畫面格的輸出值。
